abstract: There may be a billion people on Facebook, says Jeff Gibbard, but no business needs to reach a billion people.
snippet: There may be a billion people on Facebook, says Jeff Gibbard, but no business needs to reach a billion people.
lead_paragraph: A guide we just published discusses ways small businesses can make the most of Facebook’s revamped advertising programs. In a conversation that has been condensed and edited, we asked Jeff Gibbard, a social media marketer, to talk about whether small-business owners are likely to get the best return on investment on Facebook or on one of the many other options available. Mr. Gibbard is president of True Voice Media in Philadelphia, an agency that devises social media strategies for small and medium-size businesses. He is also the creator of Social Media Philanthropy, a social media marketing blog that, among other things, attempts to simplify social media concepts.

headline.main: A Social Media Marketer Assesses Facebook’s Advertising Platform
